Sentencas: A novel trigeneration system which integrates a SOFC system, an Organic Rankine Cycle (ORC), and an ammonia water absorption chiller with a CO2 capture system is proposed and investigated.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of an integrated solid oxide fuel cell, Organic Rankine Cycle and absorption chiller trigeneration system with CO2 capture

Sentencas: The exhaust gas from SOFC anode combusts with pure O-2 instead of air and thus the combustion products mainly consist of CO2 and H2O, which the CO2 can be captured easily by the condensation method; in SOFC cathode side, a series-connected ORC and ammonia water absorption chiller heat recovery system which can produce power, heat and cooling is employed to recover the waste heat of SOFC cathode exhaust gas.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of an integrated solid oxide fuel cell, Organic Rankine Cycle and absorption chiller trigeneration system with CO2 capture

Sentencas: A mathematical model is developed to study the system performance under steady-state conditions.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of an integrated solid oxide fuel cell, Organic Rankine Cycle and absorption chiller trigeneration system with CO2 capture

Sentencas: The calculated results show that the net electrical efficiency and the exergy efficiency of the integrated system can reach 52.83% and 59.96%, respectively.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of an integrated solid oxide fuel cell, Organic Rankine Cycle and absorption chiller trigeneration system with CO2 capture

Sentencas: The trigeneration efficiencies of the combined system without and with CO2 capture are 74.28% and 72.23%, respectively.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of an integrated solid oxide fuel cell, Organic Rankine Cycle and absorption chiller trigeneration system with CO2 capture

Sentencas: The effects of the SOFC inlet temperature, the current density, the steam-to-carbon ratio, the pinch point temperature difference and the turbine II inlet pressure on the trigeneration system performances are investigated in detail.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of an integrated solid oxide fuel cell, Organic Rankine Cycle and absorption chiller trigeneration system with CO2 capture

Sentencas: The research achievement in this paper can provide the useful reference for SOFC based trigeneration system with low energy consumption for CO2 capture.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of an integrated solid oxide fuel cell, Organic Rankine Cycle and absorption chiller trigeneration system with CO2 capture
